description: Material: Plastic, Color: Purple, Weight: 25.0 gm, Ideal For: Women, Price: Rs. 120, Features: Absorbs quickly into the skin, non-greasy body butter enables convenient application, rich in shea butter, Brazil nut oil, and sunflower oil for intense moisturization, leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth, free from sulphates, parabens, phthalates, silicones, and animal-derived ingredients.
